titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to modify Govermentwide goals for certain small business concerns.
To amend the Small Business Act to modify Govermentwide goals for certain small business concerns.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: This bill increases federal government goals for procurement contracts awarded to certain small businesses (e.g., women-owned small businesses and small businesses owned and controlled by socially and economically disadvantaged individuals).
